summary: CONSUMER RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER FROM THE MANUFACTURER ON THE SAMSUN MICROWAVE OVEN MODEL MR5493G01 IN OCTOBER. CONSUMER CALLED SEVERAL PHONE NUMBERS, ONE OF THEM WAS  1-866-461-2289. THE PERSON WHO ANSWERED THE PHONE INDICATED  THAT THEY DID NOT HAVE A TECHNICIAN AVAILABLE. CONSUMER WAS TOLD TO  BRING THE VEHICLE TO  THE SITE, AND PROMISED TO CALL CONSUMER WHEN VEHICLE WAS READY.*AK
WHEN FILLING GASOLINE, CONSIDERABLE QUANTITY OF GASOLINE IS PUSHED BACK UP THE SPOUT POURING ON THE GROUND DUE TO THE GAS TANK FILLER PIPE THAT WAS NOT INSTALLED CORRECTLY. YH
